TextView.android:text: While the u verbs conjugate in similar ways, there are some differences. When you have a verb that ends in just u, you need to replace「う」(u) with 「わ」(wa) and attach 「ない」
Example: to think: 思う (omou) + わ (wa) + ない (nai) = 思わない (omowanai) (to not think)
For all other u-verbs: Replace the u-vowel sound with the a-vowel equivalent and attach 「ない」(nai). The exact replacement for each is shown below:
